transcript:
Customer: Tame je vyakti ne call karyo chhe, e anya call par vyast.
Customer: Tame?
Customer: Mane baat kar liya sir mujhe thoda hello. 
Executive: Hanji. 
Customer: Hello. 
Customer: Mene mene baat kar liya sir. 
Executive: Hello. 
Executive: Hello. 
Executive: Good morning sir. 
Customer: Sir. 
Customer: Ye mujhko nikal do bhai jo Aditya hai na wohi rahega.
Executive: Good morning sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir Shubham bol raha tha India Mart side office sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan sir woh fir se aapne na aaj request
Executive: dala tha na video meet ka to wohi puch raha tha aap hai online to connect kar lete hain ek baar.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh jo Aditya hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wohi rahega woh hamara account manager dusre dusre aap teen teen din mein teen badalte ho aisa mat karo na.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir wahi hai Chandra hi hai sir aapka account manager main nahi badla hu Chandra hi hai. 
Executive: Thik hai kyunki aapka do din mein do din main Chandra ka manager hu aapka do complaint lagatar aa gaya na to escalate ho jata hai issue sir ho sakta hai ki Chandra mujhe pata hai koi aisa issue nahi hai kyunki aapse meri kal baat hui thi kal Chandra tha nahi thik hai sir. 
Executive: To main asli phone kar raha hu aapne bola tha na aaj time de aaj ke liye karne ke liye. 
Executive: Thik hai video meet aapke sath Chandra hi karega wahi connect karega to main puch raha hu kis time connect kar le fir woh aapse Chandra.
Customer: Woh jo aap hi rakho. 
Customer: Kyunki sir ye karunga usko rakho paanch che din ke baad karenge.
Executive: To sir ye ticket complaint open kar dete hain na sir aap baar baar customer care pe woh dal ke request dal ke na video meet ka to usko close kar du fir main.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap close karenge to main fir open karunga.
Executive: Nahi to sir aap aap time nahi de rahe aap boliye to aap bataiye na jis din karna hai us din main connect kar lunga sir aap uske liye aapko video meet karna hai na sir bataiye kab karna hai main mana thodi kar raha hu ki nahi karunga sir main aapse aap video meet request aap tab dalenge jab main aapki request maan nahi raha hu idhar se main to mana hi nahi kar raha sir main nahi kar paunga aapke sath video meet tab to aap upar jayenge na sir aap mujhe time dijiye jis din denge us din karunga sir aapse aap bataiye to sir kis din karna hai aap abhi se bol rahe hain che saat din tak karna hai che saat din baad karna hai to che saat din tak is company ne koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Jo bhi date rahenge us date pe main team connect kar legi sir aapko account manager connect kar lega aapse aap time to bataiye sir kab karna hai isko open ye to hamare liye hota hai na ki hum aapse connect kar paye ki aapka ye request aaya hai sir to woh main connect kar raha hu sir aapse to aap bataiye kis din connect karna hai sir aap us din aapse connect kar lunga main aur us din connect na ho to aap open kar dena fir se. 
Executive: Thik hai aap mujhe bataiye kis din fir connect karna hai sir aap kis time available hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: To bataiye kaise Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants the same account manager.

- Customer wants to schedule a video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive assured the same account manager will connect.

- Executive asked the customer to provide a suitable time.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive asked the customer to provide a suitable time.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, video meet, request
